missing_optimizations: Early-return check based on OSR mode in addInstruction
additional_optimizations: Changed to const reference in run function to avoid unnecessary copies
reasons_for_missed_optimizations: The LLM version may have focused on simplifying the implementation and may not have fully recognized the performance implications of exiting early in certain conditions, as the focus could have been on keeping the logic straightforward.
additional_insights: Both optimizations focus on efficiency, but the hand-optimized version explicitly considers control flow by avoiding unnecessary operations when certain conditions are not met. It's crucial in performance-sensitive contexts to identify and implement such early exits, especially in repetitive operations.
